alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Gallatin; Owen (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 12:16AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CARROLL, NORTHWESTERN OWEN AND WESTERN GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 AM EDT... At 1213 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near New Castle, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vevay, Owenton, Glencoe, Ghent, Sanders, Sparta, Worthville, Long Ridge, Langstaff, Wheatley, New Liberty, English, Squiresville, Eagle Station, Easterday and Carson. This includes I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 39 and 59. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
